nodes.text: Holodarts was a hologram game in existence by the year 0 ABY. The Lean Nuuti Bar and Grill restaurant, located on the space station known as StarForge Station, had a game of holodarts. Sometime early in the year it was played by a group of pirates when the formerly Imperial EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Far Orbit, whose crew had recently mutinied from under Imperial control, was docked at the space station.

Holodarts first appeared in Preparing for War, an adventure scenario in 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, and had the same theme of the previous publication Pirates & Privateers, as it followed the privateering vessel Far Orbit.
